physical:
OMNIFIT SHORTS (12 min)
Standard:
4 Rounds:
- 10 Deadlifts (light–moderate)
- 8 Burpees
- :20 Plank Hold

Bodyweight:
4 Rounds:
- 12 Good Mornings (2-1-1)
- 8 Burpees
- :20 Plank Hold
neurological: Stand on one leg for 45 seconds each side, eyes on one point.
cognitive: Say one task you will complete today (what + when).
emotional: Breathe 4 seconds in through the nose, 4 seconds out through the mouth ×5.
lifestyle: Drink 250–300 ml of water before coffee.

physical:
OMNIFIT SHORTS (12 min)
Standard:
AMRAP 12:
- 5 Neutral-Grip Pull-Ups
- 10 Push-Ups

Bodyweight:
AMRAP 12:
- 6 Table Rows
- 10 Push-Ups
cognitive: Set a 3-minute timer and do one task only.
emotional: 5 slow breaths feeling ribs expand and soften.
lifestyle: Add one protein food to breakfast.

physical:
OMNIFIT SHORTS (12 min)
One Version:
3 Rounds:
- :45 Sit-Ups
- :45 Walking Lunges
- :45 Bear Crawl
- :45 Rest
neurological: Reach both hands up and down a wall 10 times.
cognitive: Write one sentence about what went well today.
emotional: 2 minutes slow breathing while noticing heartbeat.

physical:
OMNIFIT SHORTS (12 min)
Standard:
EMOM 12:
- :30 Jump Rope
- :30 Rest

Bodyweight:
EMOM 12:
- :30 Fast March / Run in Place
- :30 Rest
neurological: Step up a stair 10 times using full foot.
cognitive: Recall one moment that made you smile today.
emotional: Smile gently and take one long breath.
lifestyle: Add one colorful fruit or vegetable today.

physical:
OMNIFIT SHORTS (12 min)
One Version:
12-minute steady walk, nasal breathing, easy pace.
neurological: Turn your head side to side 5× each way.
emotional: Walk slowly for 5 minutes and feel your body settle.

physical:

physical:
OMNIFIT SHORTS (12 min)
One Version (Water):
12-minute easy swim or water walk

Land Alternative:
12-minute easy cardio flow:
- 1 min walk
- 1 min slow air squats (repeat 6×)
cognitive: Do one task only for 3 minutes.
lifestyle: Add 20 g of protein to breakfast.

physical:

- :30 Slow Scap Circles

neurological: Stand to sit without hands ×6 with control.
cognitive: Write one line: “What matters most today?”
emotional: Sit still 2 minutes noticing breath + heartbeat.
lifestyle: Take a 10-minute walk after your main meal.
